Description:

Murdered: Soul Suspect - a fascinating journey, where the player is put in front of one of the most 
challenging tasks - solve the mystery of his own murder. The main hero of the story appears, Ronan
O'Connor, a detective with a very interesting past, whose life was rudely interrupted by a ruthless 
killer. Unable to go on and stuck in limbo Darkness, the protagonist can not find peace until you 
expose the criminals. 

Using newfound abilities, Ronan can move freely around the city of Salem, in Massachusetts. 
Unable to communicate with the detectives working on the investigation of his death, 
the protagonist is forced to read people's minds, influencing their minds and actions. 
As a detective investigation will even interrogate ghosts living in the city, to collect 
pieces of the puzzle in the whole picture of what happened. But the road will not be easy - 
in the world of darkness Ronan have to fight with demonic spirits that will strongly interfere 
learn the shocking truth of who was behind his death.
